landing.title: Overview
landing.motd: We have had reports of top ups not being processed. Usually your top up will be refunded within 48 hours. You can prevent unnecessary fines and help us by filling in {link}. Sadly we cannot detect these things as this happens between our payment processor and iDeal.

settings.confirmChangeNFC: Are you sure you want to change the NFC code?
settings.confirmDeleteNFC: Are you sure you want to delete the NFC code?
settings.confirmChangeApiKey: Are you sure you want to change the API key?
settings.confirmDeleteApiKey: Are you sure you want to delete the API key?

balance.allIsFines: All of which is a fine

tooltip.disabled: You will not receive email notifications for any transactions
tooltip.own: You will receive email notifications only for transactions you make yourself
tooltip.other: You will receive email notifications only for transactions made by others for you
tooltip.all: You will receive email notifications for all transactions, including those made by others for you
